Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CME warehouse inventory tracking system

Implements automated daily tracking of CME warehouse inventories for
Copper, Platinum, and Palladium with GitHub Actions scheduling.

New files:
- scripts/fetch_cme_inventory.py: Downloads and parses CME XLS reports
- .github/workflows/cme-inventory.yml: Daily automation at 10:30pm ET
- cme_inventory.py: Integration module with signal generation
- data/cme_inventory.csv: Per-warehouse inventory data

Features:
- Per-warehouse granularity \(BALTIMORE, DETROIT, etc.\)
- 5D/20D rate of change calculation
- Inventory state detection \(drawdown/flat/build\)
- Combined signal matrix \(inventory + price + macro\)
- UI section with trend charts and action guidance

Based on inventory_data.md framework:
"When price and inventory disagree, inventory wins â€” eventually."
